About Me

Yohannes Libanos · Full-Stack Engineer


Yohannes Libanos is a front end developer based in London. He is interested in building engaging websites and web-apps that work across all device types and browsers.

He loves to code for the web especially with JavaScript and Python. He works passionately to make use of the best tools to get the job done.
